name: Blood of the Hunt
entries: At 15th level, whenever you reduce a creature to 0 hit points you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. In addition, when you reduce a fiend, undead, or your Slayerâ€™s Quarry to 0 hit points you may take an additional action. Once you use this secondary effect you cannot use it again until you finish a long rest.
